channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Qwizcards – online quizzes and flashcards
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Qwizcards – online quizzes and flashcards

item.title: CVE-2021-24706|2024-08-03T19:42:16.193Z -- unknown -- qwizcards%20%E2%80%93%20online%20quizzes%20and%20flashcards
item.description: The Qwizcards – online quizzes and flashcards WordPress plugin before 3.62 does not properly sanitize and escape some of its settings, allowing high privilege users to perform Cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
